title.rendered: Nicki Nicole will give a show at the Metaverse Fashion Week: what are the fashionista NFTs she launched for the event like – EPU

content.rendered:
Nicky Nicole will be the first and only Latin American artist to participate in the Metaverse Fashion Week (MVFW) in Decentralandthe first virtual world based on blockchain, built and governed by its more than 500,000 monthly users.

The urban artist will close the day three of the five that the event will last: will be presented on Saturday 26 at 9pm GMT (3:00 p.m. Mexico / 6:00 p.m. Argentina / 10:00 p.m. Spain) in the after party, after the show that will be offered Bob Sinclair.

The Metaverse Fashion Week (March 23-27) will include runway shows, pop-up shops, fashion experiences and parties showcasing digital and wearable designs from top designers. Among the firms that will participate in the event are: Dolce and Gabbana, Paco Rabanne, elie saab, Ether Y Chufy.

Digital fashion has created a whole booming economy in Decentraland: last year alone, more than a million dollars were registered in the sale of technological clothing for avatars.

For the event, Nicki Nicole will present alongside enigma.art –the platform of digital assets and experiences of CriptoArte– an exclusive collection of 5 NFT wearables. It is a series of specially designed garments with which users can customize the avatars that will attend the show that Rosario will give at the MVFW after party.

Nicki Nicole • Light Years

“We are very excited to once again be protagonists of the most disruptive trends in the music scene in Latin America, with new formats of NFTs that allow artists to strengthen the bond with their audiencemaking us present in the spaces where they are today, such as the Metaverse”, commented Matias LoizagaCEO of the platform that has already presented collections of unpublished NFTs from Babasonics, The Fabulous Cadillacs, Duki, soda Stereo Y Bizarre.

Here are the other three garments specially designed by Nicki Nicole that can be obtained in NFT format: from glasses and his iconic “piluso” hat to an oversize t-shirt with an exclusive print.
